post:
Host Mayo is Fast, Secure, Affordable and Powerful [SSD Web Hosting](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php) provider. We offer CPanel with Cloud Linux system which improves the overall stability of a shared hosting environment and increases server density by 100%.

* All our hosting plans come loaded with following features:
*  Latest CPanel with Cloud Linux
*  Pure SSD storage
*  Softaculous Auto Installer
*  Free CPanel Migration
*  USA based server
*  White Label Server


**Exclusive Offer!!**
Enjoy 50% Recurring discount using Promotional Code: **extreme** (Use the coupon on checkout page.)
All prices are mentioned below using 80% off coupon.

_Starter Plan - $6Year OR 0.75$/Month_

*  1 GB Disk Space
*  1 Domain
*  10 Sub Domains
*  10 Email Accounts
*  10 MySQL Databases
*  10 FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=4)

_Economy Plan - $15/Year OR 1.5$Month_

*  5 GB Disk Space
*  5 Domains
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order Now](http://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=4)

_Professional Plan - $20/Year OR 2$/Month_

*  15 Disk Space
*  Unlimited Domains
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](http://www.hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=9)


**Payment Modes**

We accept PayPal, Credit Card, Bitcoins, Check / Money Order.

**[For more resources order business hosting with 50% recurring discount using coupon "extreme"!](https://hostmayo.com/business-hosting.php)**
